    Pyodbc A package that will allow you to connect to databases with Python.GIMP A free, yet fully-featured, image editing program.FileZilla A File Transfer Protocol client that will allow you to easily upload content to your hosting service.PuTTY Connect to other computers through SSH on a Windows computer by using this helpful tool.GitHub Host your programming projects online for free through the Git system.Git Easily document revisions and allow others to collaborate on projects with this file management tool.G Suite Let Google take care of email and other tools for your website with this service that you can try for free.JES Easily manipulate media with python in this development environment aimed at students.Ionic Develop for both Android and iOS platforms using JavaScript with this framework.Android Studio Develop native applications for Android with this fully-featured editor.Milkman Plugins Access plugins that allow you to make use of various capabilities of mobile devices and online tools when developing in ActionScript.Apple Developer Access resources to help you develop for Apple products.iTunes Connect Submit your apps to the Apple app store and manage your existing apps.Codebird PHP Easily post to twitter from a program written in PHP with this helpful tool.Facebook API Explorer Test various API calls to Facebook and even generate authentication tokens.
